name: illucio
description:
An illusive and beautiful 3D puzzle! Each level is a mind bending challenge that requires hard thinking and mapping out every move. How many levels can you complete?

Simply slide your finger in the direction you want the cube to roll!

100 illusive levels to solve!

Flashy visuals!

Share your progress after completing a level!



Follow me:
